item.title: I want Chalk writing on a board VFX (Trial for a weekly gig position) - Upwork
item.description:
So this is just a trial for a full-time position that will start in August.
I will need you to put chalk writing on the board with visual effects so it looks real.
You will do it on this video I got from YouTube and if I like it, you can do it on the video that I will shoot in August.
You will do it each week for each episode, same job, just different writing.
For this trial you are going to write what I will ask you on the first job in August if you are hired.
You will write in Arabic the following;
لن أنتخب على تبون مرة أخرى



Budget: $40
Posted On: June 19, 2024 08:13 UTC
Category: Visual Effects
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Chroma Keying, Photo Retouching, Visual Effects, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Chroma Keying, Photo Retouching, Visual Effects, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: United States

item.description:

item.title: Subtitles Need adding to video - Upwork
item.description:
I have 8 videos all under 3 minutes (some 30s long) that need subtitles added to them, I have attached an example to this job post.

For the longer videos where the screen is recorded, we need to look similar to this but with more text shown as it is a tutorial and not a TikTok video, ideally, we want two lines of text- https://i.imgur.com/vU7MKxL.png

But for the video where the person is speaking to the camera, it can be similar to the screenshot above where its just a few words, or maybe one line of text per sentence.

If you can show me two examples with the videos i have provided i will be happy to hire you for the full project.

please make sure to keep the quality of the video as well

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 19, 2024 07:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Subtitles
Skills: Video Editing, Subtitles
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Looking for rockstar Video Ad Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a rockstar Meta Ads Video Ad Editor? 🚀

Well, this might be the best job posting you read all year...

I'm looking for an experienced Meta Ads Video Ad Editor for my E-Commerce Growth Agency.

Your job:
- Edit high converting video ad creatives based on our briefings and examples in CapCut
- Structure your edits in a way so they are easily adaptable (change hook, "bodies", CTAs, text and voiceoverlays quickly)
- find stock footage in our Artlist account
- produce 20-30 Video ad variations a week per client

BACKGROUND

We are an E-Commerce Growth Agency help grow their business despite difficult economic circumstances.

We want to improve our operations so we can offer faster turnaround times, more specialized services and become the #1 E-Commerce Growth Agency in Europe.

We are currently a team of 3 (rapidly growing), with awesome team culture, and looking for the right people to join us on our mission to help ecom founders build the brands of their dreams.

Here are quick few things we are looking for from the new team members:

ABOUT YOU:

Only apply if you:

1. ✅ Fluent English
2. ✅ Are punctual, following instructions in a diligent thorough way.
3. ✅ Are structured, organized and pay attention to detail
4. ✅ Have good availability so you can focus on our project
5. ✅ Has a strong understanding of CapCut, AI Tools and other videoeditiing tools
6. ✅ Communicate excellently and regularly.
7. ✅ You do the work yourself, NO OUTSOURCING. NO AGENCIES.
8. ✅ Great team player
9. ✅ You have a strong track record in video ads editing (please add portfolio to your proposal)
10. ✅ Are able to use Loom videos or similar to share your progress and get instructions.
11. ✅ Are able to work in CET hours.
12. ✅ German is a huge plus but no must

So if you're a rockstar Video Ads Editor, you're fun to work with, and excited to join a fully remote team, then please apply for the job and let's chat.

Speak soon!
Dominik

PS. To show that you've read the full post, put 'NO ROCKET SCIENCE 🚀' at the top of your proposal, so I know who the best candidates are :)

Hourly Range: $8.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 07:16 UTC
Category: Web Design
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Ad, Short Video Ad, CapCut, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Ad, Short Video Ad, CapCut, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Germany
click to apply
